title: Anyone else interesting in a "Neon Strike" skin line?
body:
Whoops. Clearly meant "interested in," my bad. ANYWAYS...

Neon Strike Vi has to be my favorite skin next to DJ Sona. (I like to drop dem beats)

However, I haven't seen many concepts that build off of "Neon Strike." When I hear "Neon Strike," I picture a brightly colored champion with flashy particles that are in your face. Some champions that come to mind that would work well with this concept would be{{champion:236}}, {{champion:131}}, {{champion:89}}, {{champion:127}}, and {{champion:85}}. They are all hard engage that really work well the idea itself, as well as having particles that can be used to really fit the theme.

I'm hoping to see if others are interested in the line  and/or have ideas on what champions would be best suited. Maybe if enough people show interest the idea can be considered. (:

EDIT FOR CONCEPTS:
Neon Strike Sion by BrotherBaston on deviantart:
http://th07.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/f/2014/290/e/f/neon_strike_sion_by_brotherbaston-d834dhp.jpg

Neon Strike Caitlyn* by Xelandra on deviantart:
http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2013/153/e/2/neon_strike_caitlyn_concept_by_xelandra-d67ly9k.jpg

Neon Strike Fiora by Pokadotzombie on deviantart:
http://fc05.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2015/019/1/e/neon_strike_fiora_by_polkadotzombie-d8ej81t.png

Other Champion Ideas:
{{champion:99}} : Of course the light mage would fit this theme perfectly. It's also a drastic difference compared to her currently available skins.
{{champion:112}} : He has a flashy skill set that could really work with the color scheme. He's also in the same boat as Lux, since his skins are more dark; a brighter skin could really round out his skin roster well.

replies.body:
I've heard that one way to attract the elusive "artist" is to provide concept art. 

They eat that stuff up like it's free bagels on Wednesday.
Sadly I'm more of a Math/Statistics guy than an artist. :C I have ideas....but not the talent.
Doesn't mean you can't share them!

http://www.deviantart.com/art/Neon-Strike-Sion-488972365

Now how cool would this be? Instead of a red glow over Sion when he ults, imagine a strobe of alternating neon colors when he runs by screaming "NOXXXXXUUUUUUUUUUSSSSSSSSS!!!!!!!"

Nah he should scream
RAAAAAVVVEEEEEE 
or
PAARRRRTTTYYYYY

Instead of a third arm, he would have a series of holographic circles hovering over his shoulder that spin when firing his laser.

http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz310/XeroFletcher/Animated%20Gifs/SheenbyXombie.gif~original
Also with an outrageous recall animation.

And DJ Sona needs someone to share her awesome headwear.
*salivates profusely*
Please yes!!

Someone did a Neon Strike Cait: http://xelandra.deviantart.com/art/Neon-Strike-Caitlyn-Concept-375578552 and it's AWESOME.

In fact, pm [all of her league stuff](http://xelandra.deviantart.com/gallery/45534570/League-of-Legends) is
I've seen this before and love it! I would instabuy it.
Add Lux to the list because Neon Strike would have been a lot better than Steel Legion.
Done and done. I have no idea why I didn't add her on the list to begin with...
i actually really agree with this! it'd definitely would have been a unique skin theme compared to her other skins.
If someone drew a neon strike Di for me, I'd probably do unspeakable things tbh
What about Neon Strike lux? She is the light mage after all.
I think Jayce could fit the theme wel.
I'm not saying I need to have neon strike taric or I'll die, but I'm lying.

> [{quoted}](name=Solidair3,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UFngLE4X,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-03T00:58:15.623+0000)
>
> I'm not saying I need to have neon strike taric or I'll die, but I'm lying.

I would only take this if he was topless, in skintight brightly colored tron pants with neon suspenders covered in gems. For the love of all that is holy, I NEED a topless Taric skin.
I really don't  think there's any other way.

> [{quoted}](name=Solidair3,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UFngLE4X,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-04-03T13:59:55.924+0000)
>
> I really don't  think there's any other way.

There IS another way, but it'd either involve a Rated-R rating on the skin or a pixel bubble covering Taric's gems.
That Sion though. That MASSIVE package on the front and the popping buns on the back.

Now I have been thinking about this for a long time.
I remember from a post Riot made that supposely canonly connects the Super Galaxy Skins with Neon Strike, referring to Neon Strike as a strike force that Shyvana wanted to be part of or something. (Riot,animepls)

So The super galaxy skin champs are out because they can't be both.
And I myself have a headcanon that Star Guardian and super galaxy/neon strike take place in the same universe. Like they are different hero teams (Think Avengers and xmen) So Star guardian champs are out too

~~And I was going to make my champion OC a Neon Strike skin but lets ignore him right now~~
So for the skin line, I was thinking.
Jungle/top: Vi and Sion
Mid: Ahri/Kannon
ADC: Calityn (This is a must.)
Support: Tie between Bard and Zilean (IF KINDRED CAN HAVE SUPER GALAXY, BARD CAN GET NEON STRIKE, THEY ARE LIKE BUDDIES OR SOMETHING THAT HAVE COFFEE ON TUESDAYS)
the neon strike skin line is one of the best . so many champs can fit it well {{champion:103}} {{champion:30}}  {{champion:102}}  and many more it the perfect theme

OH MY GLOB I LOVE THIS FIORA SKIN!!!
I play Fiora as my main character on League, and all her skins are SO BORING! I would LOVE this skin!
i dont dig the colors on sion tho, something besides yellow suit pls lol
Nope, I want to see more skins from this line but not from the deviatnarttheft community, the worst there is.
Ah sorry about that. It is the only site I could find images of these concepts. If you know of other sites or if you have some concepts yourself, feel free to share! (:
Better sites would be Photobucket, Imagr, or even putting the image directly onto this site.
My only complaint is why Neon Strike Fiora has to be shirtless with her half jacket vacuum sealed onto her torso.  Other than that, these are some really cool skin concepts and all really well done!
That's my only complaint as well! Replace the revealed skin with yellow as if it was part of the suit and I think it would look great. Also, that pink saber is my favorite part of the design. WANT.
YEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEESSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS A swingin yellow and blue body suit! That would be awesome! The pink sabers are also a nice touch C:
Iwould pay cash for Neon strike Fiora
I mean that is how skins work
I'm throwing my wallet at my screen yet no production of Neon Strike Fiora has begun yet, WHAT AM I DOING WRONG? DO I NEED TO UPGRADE MY POWER TRANSFORMERS FIRST?

{{champion:12}} unchained

{{champion:18}}  Riot Girl..
For Leona, make her shield a solid central component that projects a transparent force shield.
{{champion:120}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:26}}  should all come to mind since Neon Strike appears to be a flashy aka speedy theme.
